title: WTB: Large collection of baseball cards...still looking!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: WTB: Large collection of baseball cards...still looking!
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm looking to purchase a large collection of cards. Sets, starter sets, HOFers, stars, PSA/SGC/BVG or ungraded are all fine.  Topps, Fleer, Bowman, Goudey, T206....whatever!  Prewar and postwar would likely work.  I'm kind of getting a feel of what's out there.  :)

Thanks so much, and looking forward to hearing from you!

Jimi
Still looking, guys!  Thanks ahead of time, and looking forward to hearing from you!

I have 128 PSA-graded T206 cards to sell...if that interests you!  Let me know if you are and I'll send you a list.  Thanks.

Marty
